name: Last Will (itch)
description:
Help Will give letters to angry chickens and emotionless flowers. Dog(the goodest boi) at end.

Use left mouse button to shoot letters, and WASD  to move.

Please enable fullscreen!

Tips:

Chickens need to relax and roll... for 2 seconds. Keep your patience!

I heard that if you "compliment" a flower's head they'll be friendly

Will sure can write a lot of letters

Make every time count! Flowers and chickens remember friendship, and bones always stick to you! Bones, next to dogs, are a skeleton's best friend!

If I get at least 20 bucks I'll change the music and background, alongside 2-3 additional endings

Maybe a tip sign?
